# Explore your imagination.

## Make creativity more collaborative and fun. Get inspired and connect with
others through your ideas, style and ingenuity.

BUY $CHAI

### CHROMAAI your way

CHROMAAI is a community-centered brand in a quest to close the gap between
humanity and AI.  

Access CHROMAAI from your favorite platforms. Enjoying a seamless experience
across all of them.

### Text to Image

Create unique images just with your words.

### Brilliant Styles

Style presets make it easy to take full control over how your creations look
and feel.

### Image Variations

Generate new variations of an image with a simple click.

### Deep Fusion

Fuse an image with a text prompt to generate a new creation.

### Inpainting

Alter an image by generating or removing content from the painted area.

### Infinitely Expand Images

Breaking boundaries by extending an image beyond its edges to a new aspect
ratio.

### Next-gen Image Upscaling

Bring back astonishing details by enhancing the resolution of any image.

### Photonic Engine

New extra powers to your generations with control over depth, human pose,
edges or creating a masterpiece from your drawings.

### CHROMAAI GPT4 CHATBOT

Your own AI assistant that’s using natural language processing to handle a
wide range of queries, from simple questions to complex requests. Even this
text has been written with her help.

## Try it for free now!

A picture is worth a thousand words.

Join. Explore. Create.

JOIN US
